an10.24:1.1: At one time Venerable Mahācunda was staying in the land of the Cetis at Sahajāti.
an10.24:2.1: “Reverends, a mendicant who makes a declaration of knowledge says:
an10.24:2.2: ‘I know this teaching, I see this teaching.’
an10.24:2.3: Suppose that greed masters that mendicant and keeps going.
an10.24:2.12: or corrupt wishes master that mendicant and keep going. You should know of them:
an10.24:2.13: ‘This venerable does not have the understanding that would eliminate greed, so greed masters them and keeps going.
an10.24:2.14: They don’t have the understanding that would eliminate hate …
an10.24:2.22: or corrupt wishes, so corrupt wishes master them and keep going.’
an10.24:3.1: A mendicant who makes a declaration of development says:
an10.24:3.2: ‘I am developed in physical endurance, ethics, mind, and wisdom.’
an10.24:3.3: Suppose that greed masters that mendicant and keeps going.
an10.24:3.12: or corrupt wishes master that mendicant and keep going. You should know of them:
an10.24:3.13: ‘This venerable does not have the understanding that would eliminate greed, so greed masters them and keeps going.
an10.24:3.14: They don’t have the understanding that would eliminate hate …
an10.24:3.22: or corrupt wishes, so corrupt wishes master them and keep going.’
an10.24:4.1: A mendicant who makes a declaration of both knowledge and development says:
an10.24:4.2: ‘I know this teaching, I see this teaching. And I am developed in physical endurance, ethics, mind, and wisdom.’
an10.24:4.3: Suppose that greed masters that mendicant and keeps going.
an10.24:4.12: or corrupt wishes master that mendicant and keep going. You should know of them:
an10.24:4.13: ‘This venerable does not have the understanding that would eliminate greed, so greed masters them and keeps going.
an10.24:4.14: They don’t have the understanding that would eliminate hate …
an10.24:4.22: or corrupt wishes, so corrupt wishes master them and keep going.’
an10.24:5.1: Suppose a poor, needy, and penniless person was to declare themselves to be rich, affluent, and wealthy.
an10.24:5.2: But when it came time to make a payment they weren’t able to come up with any money, grain, silver, or gold.
an10.24:5.3: Then they would know of them:
an10.24:5.4: ‘This person declares themselves to be rich, affluent, and wealthy, but they are in fact poor, penniless, and needy.’
an10.24:5.6: Because when it came time to make a payment they weren’t able to come up with any money, grain, silver, or gold.
an10.24:6.1: In the same way, a mendicant who makes a declaration of knowledge and development says:
an10.24:6.2: ‘I know this teaching, I see this teaching. And I am developed in physical endurance, ethics, mind, and wisdom.’
an10.24:6.3: Suppose that greed masters that mendicant and keeps going.
an10.24:6.12: or corrupt wishes master that mendicant and keep going. You should know of them:
an10.24:6.13: ‘This venerable does not have the understanding that would eliminate greed, so greed masters them and keeps going.
an10.24:6.14: They don’t have the understanding that would eliminate hate …
an10.24:6.22: or corrupt wishes, so corrupt wishes master them and keep going.’
an10.24:7.1: A mendicant who makes a declaration of knowledge says:
an10.24:7.2: ‘I know this teaching, I see this teaching.’
an10.24:7.3: Suppose that greed does not master that mendicant and keep going.
an10.24:7.12: or corrupt wishes don’t master that mendicant and keep going. You should know of them:
an10.24:7.13: ‘This venerable has the understanding that eliminates greed, so greed doesn’t master them and keep going.
an10.24:7.14: They have the understanding that eliminates hate …
an10.24:7.22: and corrupt wishes, so corrupt wishes don’t master them and keep going.’
an10.24:8.1: A mendicant who makes a declaration of development says:
an10.24:8.2: ‘I am developed in physical endurance, ethics, mind, and wisdom.’
an10.24:8.3: Suppose that greed does not master that mendicant and keep going.
an10.24:8.12: or corrupt wishes don’t master that mendicant and keep going. You should know of them:
an10.24:8.13: ‘This venerable has the understanding that eliminates greed, so greed doesn’t master them and keep going.
an10.24:8.14: They have the understanding that eliminates hate …
an10.24:8.22: and corrupt wishes, so corrupt wishes don’t master them and keep going.’
an10.24:9.1: A mendicant who makes a declaration of both knowledge and development says:
an10.24:9.2: ‘I know this teaching, I see this teaching. And I am developed in physical endurance, ethics, mind, and wisdom.’
an10.24:9.3: Suppose that greed does not master that mendicant and keep going.
an10.24:9.12: or corrupt wishes don’t master that mendicant and keep going. You should know of them:
an10.24:9.13: ‘This venerable has the understanding that eliminates greed, so greed doesn’t master them and keep going.
an10.24:9.14: They have the understanding that eliminates hate …
an10.24:9.22: and corrupt wishes, so corrupt wishes don’t master them and keep going.’
an10.24:10.1: Suppose a rich, affluent, and wealthy person was to declare themselves to be rich, affluent, and wealthy.
an10.24:10.2: And whenever it came time to make a payment they were able to come up with the money, grain, silver, or gold.
an10.24:10.3: Then they would know of them:
an10.24:10.4: ‘This person declares themselves to be rich, affluent, and wealthy, and they are in fact rich, affluent, and wealthy.’
an10.24:10.6: Because when it came time to make a payment they were able to come up with the money, grain, silver, or gold.
an10.24:11.1: In the same way, a mendicant who makes a declaration of knowledge and development says:
an10.24:11.2: ‘I know this teaching, I see this teaching. And I am developed in physical endurance, ethics, mind, and wisdom.’
an10.24:11.3: Suppose that greed does not master that mendicant and keep going.
an10.24:11.12: or corrupt wishes don’t master that mendicant and keep going. You should know of them:
an10.24:11.13: ‘This venerable has the understanding that eliminates greed, so greed doesn’t master them and keep going.
an10.24:11.14: They have the understanding that eliminates hate …
an10.24:11.22: and corrupt wishes, so corrupt wishes don’t master them and keep going.’”
